The seq/seq.hpp header defines basic primitives for manipulating seqs.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/seq/seq.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_HEAD
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_NIL
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_TAIL
